com.cmart.PageServlets

Class SendFriendRequestServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.cmart.PageServlets.SendFriendRequestServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(name="SendFriendRequestServlet",
            urlPatterns="/sendfriendrequest")
public class SendFriendRequestServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This servlet allows a user to send a FriendRequest
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Chaohua (chaohuam@andrew.cmu.edu, ma.chaohua@gmail.com)
    See Also:
